cu.explanation_en: Setting the DRB ciphering to an invalid enum 'maybe' will cause configuration parsing errors and prevent security setup.

du.explanation_en: Setting the PHY log level to an invalid value 'error_invalid' will cause the logging configuration to fail and halt system initialization.
du.explanation_zh: 將 PHY 日誌級別設定為無效值 'error_invalid' 會導致日誌配置失敗，並停止系統初始化。
